                 [ch]Bb[/ch]

             [ch]Gm7[/ch]    [ch]BbMaj7[/ch]

[ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]

                 [ch]Bb[/ch]

[Verse 2]
              [ch]Bb[/ch]

                [ch]Gm7[/ch]

               [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]      [ch]Fsus4[/ch]

           [ch]Bb[/ch]

           [ch]Bb[/ch]

                  [ch]Gm7[/ch]

                [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]         [ch]Fsus4[/ch]

            [ch]Gm7[/ch]

[Chorus]

And swim every ocean
[ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]

                  [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]

          [ch]Gm7[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]     [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]     [ch]Ebm[/ch]
Oh, cause I   need you to see
                 [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Gm7[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]
That you are the reason

                [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]     [ch]Fsus4[/ch]
I'd climb every mountain
               [ch]Gm7[/ch]
And swim every ocean
[ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]EbMaj7[/ch]    [ch]F7[/ch]

[Intro]
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Cadd9[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]

                    [ch]Cadd9[/ch] [ch]Dsus4[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]

[Chorus].            [ch]Cadd9[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]

[Verse 3]               [ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]Em[/ch]
There goes my hand shaking. ‘Cause you are the reason
                 [ch]Cadd9[/ch] [ch]Dsus4[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]
My mind keeps bleeding. And I need you now.

[Verse 4]                [ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]Em[/ch]

[ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]Cadd9[/ch]               [ch]Dsus4[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]

I’d climb every mountain. And swim every ocean

         [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Dsus4[/ch] [ch]Em7[/ch] [ch]Cadd9[/ch]

[Bridge]
[ch]Cadd9[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
I don’t wanna fight no more. I don’t wanna hide no more.
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]Dsus4[/ch]
I don’t wanna cry no more. Come back I need you tonight
[ch]Cadd9[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
Come a little closer (oh).Just a little closer(oh)
[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]Dsus4[/ch]                   [ch]Cadd9[/ch]

[Chorus]           [ch]Cadd9[/ch]*                 [ch]Em[/ch]*

content.text:
Hey There Delilah - What A great song by The Plain White Ts

NOTE: some tabs use an F#m in the first 2 lines of the verse, I think the Bm sounds
better.


[Intro]
[ch]D[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch]

[Verse]
[ch]D[/ch]                            [ch]F#m[/ch]
Hey there Delilah, What’s it like in New York City? 
      [ch]D[/ch]                               [ch]F#m[/ch]
I’m a thousand miles away, But girl tonight you look so pretty, 
        [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch]
Yes you do, Time Square can’t shine as bright as you, 
             [ch]A[/ch]
I swear it’s true. 
[ch]D[/ch]                            [ch]F#m[/ch]
Hey there Delilah, Don’t you worry about the distance, 
          [ch]D[/ch]                                  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I’m right there if you get lonely, Give this song another listen, 
           [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]A[/ch]                [ch]Bm[/ch] 
Close your eyes, Listen to my voice it’s my disguise, 
            [ch]A[/ch]
I’m by your side. 

[Chorus]
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]     [ch]A[/ch]
Oh it’s what you do to me, Oh it’s what you do to me, 
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]             
Oh it’s what you do to me, Oh it’s what you do to me, 
               [ch]D[/ch]
What you do to me. 

[Verse]
[ch]D[/ch]                         [ch]F#m[/ch]
Hey there Delilah, I know times are getting hard, 
           [ch]D[/ch]                                    [ch]F#m[/ch]
But just believe me girl some day, I'll pay the bills with this guitar, 
              [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]Bm[/ch]
We'll have it good, We'll have the life we knew we would, 
           [ch]A[/ch]
My word is good. 
[ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]F#m[/ch]   
Hey there Delilah, I’ve got so much left to say, 
         [ch]D[/ch]                                 [ch]F#m[/ch]
If every simple song I wrote to you, Would take your breath away, 
             [ch]Bm[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]A[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch]
I’d write it all, Even more in love with me you’d fall, 
             [ch]A[/ch]
We’d have it all. 

[Chorus]
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]A[/ch]
Oh it’s what you do to me, Oh it’s what you do to me, 
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]A[/ch]       
Oh it’s what you do to me, Oh it’s what you do to me, 

[Bridge]
[ch]G[/ch]                                      [ch]A[/ch]
A thousand miles seems pretty far, But they’ve got planes and trains and cars, 
[ch]D[/ch]                                 [ch]Bm[/ch]  
I’d walk to you if I had no other way 
[ch]G[/ch]                                         [ch]A[/ch]
Our friends would all make fun of us, And we'll just laugh along because, 
   [ch]D[/ch]                                     [ch]Bm[/ch]
We know that none of them have felt this way, 
[ch]G[/ch]                               [ch]A[/ch]            
Delilah I can promise you, That by the time that we get through, 
    [ch]Bm[/ch]                                               [ch]A[/ch]
The world will never ever be the same, And you’re to blame. 

[Verse 3]
[ch]D[/ch]                        [ch]F#m[/ch]
Hey there Delilah you be good, And don’t you miss me, 
         [ch]D[/ch]                                         [ch]F#m[/ch]
Two more years and you’ll be done with school, And I'll be making history, 
       [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]A[/ch]              [ch]Bm[/ch]
Like I do, You’ll know it's all because of you, 
[ch]G[/ch]             [ch]A[/ch]            [ch]Bm[/ch]
We can do whatever we want to, 
[ch]G[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]Bm[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]
Hey there Delilah here's to you, This one’s for you. 

[Outro]
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]A[/ch]
Oh it’s what you do to me, Oh it’s what you do to me, 
[ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Bm[/ch]
Oh it’s what you do to me, Oh it’s what you do to me, 
               [ch]D[/ch]
What you do to me. 
   [ch]Bm[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Bm[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Bm[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]Bm[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]

Hey.  My friend introduced this song to me only a few days ago, but I'm in love with it
already. Here are the chords - it's in a bass -chord - bass - chord progression in 4/4.
I don't really know all the lyrics but whatever. I only did the chords for each form of
the song,..the verse, the refrain, and the bridge... but you can figure it out for the
rest of them, the chords are the same in each form, nothing changes. Here it is.


[Intro]

[ch]D[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch]


[Verse]

[ch]D[/ch]                            [ch]F#m[/ch]                           [ch]D[/ch]            
Hey there Delilah, what's it like in New York City.  I'm a thousand miles 
                [ch]F#m[/ch]                              [ch]Bm[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]                  
away girl but tonight you look so pretty yes you do.  Times Square can't 
[ch]A[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch]                [ch]A[/ch]
shine as bright as you, I swear it's true.


[Pre-Chorus]

[ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                  
Oh, it's what you do to me, oh, it's what you do to me, oh it's what you do
    [ch]Bm[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Bm[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
 to me, oh, it's what you do to me, what you do to me.


[Chorus]

  [ch]G[/ch]                                   [ch]A[/ch]                        
A thousand miles seems pretty far but they've got planes and trains and 
          [ch]D[/ch]                               [ch]Bm[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]                      
cars, I'd walk to you if there's no other way.  And all our friends make fun 
          [ch]A[/ch]                                 [ch]D[/ch]                      
of us and we'll just laugh along because we know they've never ever felt 
     [ch]Bm[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]                            [ch]A[/ch]                                
this way.  Delilah I can promise you that by the time that we are through 
    [ch]D[/ch]                             [ch]Bm[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]    [ch]Asus[/ch]  [ch]A[/ch] [ch]Asus[/ch]
the world can never ever feel the same, and you're to blame.


Well that's basically it, pretty easy.

content.text:
I'm genuinely confused as to why nobody ever properly tabbed this one out... maybe it's for premium user?
Idk. Anyway, the legendary, ever so "lacrimosa", Hey There, Delilah!, here for you all, correct.
Just a little explanation: the guitar plays basically the first and then the third and fifth note of the
chords written above the lyrics, however, instead of tabbing it all – which, of course, ain't no chords but
a tab –, I decided to write it as better as I could. It should count 8 times (1, 3 and 5 x8), but I wrote it
only 4 times because it plays beautifully on piano and it's as close as tab, while stil mantaining the
"accessibility" of chords, as I could come up with. You can totally just play it without the bass notes tho,
I'm not gonna be mad at ya. Hope you like it and see you next time,
Naonis

LYRIC GUIDE FOR NON-SPANISH SPEAKER:

Note: Luis Fonsi's original version translated to English 
      to help non-spanish speakers feel the song's emotion.


“Despacito” or “Slowly” 

Fonsi:

Sí, sabes que ya llevo un rato mirándote,
Tengo que bailar contigo hoy.
Vi que tu mirada ya estaba llamándome,
Muéstrame el camino que yo voy.

Yes, you know I’ve been looking at you for a while,

I have to dance with you today.

I saw that your look was already calling me,

show me the way and I’ll go. 

¡Oh!
Tú, tú eres el imán y yo soy el metal.
Me voy acercando y voy armando el plan,
sólo con pensarlo se acelera el pulso.
Ya, ya me está gustando más de lo normal.
Todos mis sentidos van pidiendo más,
Esto hay que tomarlo sin ningún apuro.

Oh!

You, you’re the magnet and I’m the metal.

I’m getting closer and coming up with a plan,

just thinking about it accelerates my pulse.

I’m already enjoying it more than normal.

All of my senses are asking for more,

this has to be done without a hurry.

[Chorus]
Despacito
Quiero respirar tu cuello despacito.
Deja que te diga cosas al oído,
para que te acuerdes si no estás conmigo.
Despacito
Quiero desnudarte a besos despacito.
Firmar en las paredes de tu laberinto
y hacer de tu cuerpo todo un manuscrito

Quiero ver bailar tu pelo, quiero ser tu ritmo
Que le enseñes a mi boca, tus lugares favoritos.
Déjame sobrepasar tus zonas de peligro,
hasta provocar tus gritos
y que olvides tu apellido

[Chorus]
Slowly

I want to breathe your neck slowly.

Let me whisper things in your ear,

that you’ll remember when you’re not with me.

Slowly

I want to undress you with kisses slowly.

Sign the walls of your labyrinth

and turn your body into a manuscript.  


I want to see your hair dance, I want to be your rhythm

I want you to show my mouth your favorite places.

Let me surpass your danger zone,

until it makes you scream

and makes you forget your last name. 


Daddy Yankee:

Si te pido un beso, ven, dámelo. Yo sé que estás pensándolo.
Llevo tiempo intentándolo, mami, esto es dando y dándolo.
Sabes que tu corazón conmigo te hace bam-bam.
Sabes que esa beba está buscando de mi bam-bam.
Ven, prueba de mi boca para ver cómo te sabe.
Quiero, quiero, quiero ver cuánto amor a ti te cabe.
Yo no tengo prisa, yo me quiero dar el viaje.
Empezamos lento, después salvaje.

Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito.
Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito.
Cuando tú me besas con esa destreza
veo que eres malicia con delicadeza.
Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito.
Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito.
Y es que esa belleza es un rompecabezas,
pero pa’ montarlo aquí tengo la pieza.
¡Oye!

If I ask you for a kiss, come on, give it to me. I know you’re thinking about it.

I’ve spent a while trying, mami, this is give and giving.

You know your heart with me goes bam-bam.

You know what this babe wants from me is bam-bam.

Come, taste my mouth to see how it tastes to you.

I want, want, want to see how much love fits in you.

I’m in no rush, I want to take the ride.

We’ll start slow and then go wild. 


Step by step, gentle gently.

We’ll get closer, little by little. 
When you kiss me with that skill,

I see that you are malice with finesse. 

Step by step, gentle gently.

We’ll get closer, little by little.
This beauty is a puzzle,

but to put it together I have the piece. 
Oye!

[CHORUS, 2x]

Luis Fonsi:
Despacito
Vamo’ a hacerlo en una playa en Puerto Rico,
hasta que las olas griten “¡Ay, Bendito!”
para que mi sello se quede contigo.
¡Bailalo!

Slowly

We’re going to do it on a beach in Puerto Rico,

until the waves scream “Oh, Lord!”

so that my seal [likely meaning mark or impression] stays with you.

Dance!
******************************************************************
